entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
